unnormalised: Hey everyone! Loved reading about Mithali Raj, what an inspiration! Anyone else watched "Chak De! India"? These biographies really make you appreciate the struggle. Imagine training in Delhi heat! My grandfather always says even Milkha Singh faced tougher conditions. Wish they included more about Dhyan Chand's time at Allahabad University. More power to Indian athletes! Rs. 50 for the book was a steal!
